message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'll take more, let's see what you say!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still in the lead!
I'm not going to give up much more, you're going to have to make a better offer if you want this to end!
You're not giving me much, so I'll take a bit more
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not going to give up everything!
